export const appConstants = {
  LSKey: {
    userTokenKey: 'access-token',
    cameraKey: 'isCamera',
    screenKey: 'isShareScreen',
    audioKey: 'isAudio',
    connectionTimeoutKey: 'connectionTimeout',
    lastEmojiKey: 'lastEmoji',
    videoRotationKey: 'videoRotation'
  },

  ROLE: {
    OWNER: 'OWNER',
    // TODO: chuyển MODERATOR sang presenter
    MODERATOR: 'MODERATOR',
    PARTICIPANT: 'PARTICIPANT'
  },

  MUTE_POLICY: {
    SOFT: 'SOFT',
    HARD: 'HARD',
    PUSH_TO_TALK: 'PUSH_TO_TALK',
    PRIORITY: 'PRIORITY'
  },

  PIN: {
    MAIN: 'MAIN',
    SUB: 'SUB'
  },

  TOOLBAR: {
    DEVICES_SETTING: 'DEVICES_SETTING',
    INVITE_REMIND: 'INVITE_REMIND',
    PERMISSIONS_SETTING: 'PERMISSIONS_SETTING',
    PIN_SETTING: {
      MAIN: 'MAIN',
      SUB: 'SUB'
    },
    SHARE_FILE: 'SHARE_FILE'
  },

  SUPPER_ADMIN: 'appadmin' // username supperadmin
}

export const PERMISSIONS = [
  {
    code: 'SHARE_VOICE',
    name: 'Chia sẻ giọng nói',
    owner: true,
    moderator: true,
    participant: false

    moderator: false,

  },
  {
    code: 'PIN_MAIN_SPEAKER',

    owner: true,

    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'PIN_SUB_SPEAKER',
    name: 'Ghim người dùng phụ',
    owner: true,

  },
  {
    code: 'KICK_PARTICIPANT',

    owner: true,

    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'KICK_USER',
    name: 'Kick người dùng',
    owner: true,
    moderator: false,
    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'RECORD_CONFERENCE',
    name: 'Ghi hình buổi họp',
    owner: true,
    moderator: false,
    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'TIMER_CREATE',
    name: 'Tạo đồng hồ đếm giờ',
    owner: true,
    moderator: true,
    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'TIMER_RESET',
    name: 'Làm mới đồng hồ đếm giờ',
    owner: true,
    moderator: false,
    participant: true
  },
  {
    code: 'TIMER_REMOVE',
    name: 'Xóa đồng hồ đếm giờ',
    owner: true,
    moderator: true,
    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'VOTE_CREATE',
    name: 'Tạo thăm dò ý kiến',
    owner: true,
    moderator: true,
    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'VOTE_LOCK_UNLOCK',
    name: 'Khóa/ mở khóa thăm dò ý kiến',
    owner: true,

  {
    code: 'VOTE_RESET',

    owner: true,

    participant: false

  {
    code: 'VOTE_VIEW_RESULT',
    name: 'Xem kết quả thăm dò ý kiến',
    owner: true,
    moderator: false,
    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'VOTE',
    name: 'Tham gia bỏ phiếu',
    owner: true,
    moderator: false,
    participant: false
  },
  {
    code: 'AUTHORIZE',
    name: 'Phân quyền',
    owner: true,
    moderator: false,
    participant: false
  }
]

export function checkPermission(arr, permission) {
  return arr.indexOf(permission) > -1 || arr.indexOf('CONFERENCE_ADMIN') > -1
}

export const _pollType = {
  SINGLE: 'Single',
  MULTIPLE: 'Multiple',
  OPEN_ANSWER: 'OpenAnswer'
}

export const _SLIDE = {
  _actionSlide: {
    NEXT: 'NEXT_SLIDE',
    PREVIOUS: 'PREVIOUS_SLIDE'
  },
  _externalData: {
    NUM_PAGES: 'numPages',
    CURRENT_PAGE: 'currentPage'
  }
}

export const _confType = {
  PREVIOUS: 'PREVIOUS',
  ONGOING: 'ONGOING',
  UPCOMING: 'UPCOMING'
}

export const CLIENT_ID = '839361852897-44qujgncgpan4qh2q71nsqtiik9fm5cm.apps.googleusercontent.com'
export const API_KEY = 'AIzaSyC0QS4ajtd6Tq7y1b3Yz7wYLOHrRBBZ6R4'
export const DISCOVERY_DOCS = ['https://www.googleapis.com/discovery/v1/apis/calendar/v3/rest']

export const _tabs = {
  PARTICIPANT: 'participant',
  POLL: 'poll',
  POLL_MANAGEMENT: 'poll-management',
  CHAT: 'chat',
  ATTENDANCE_MANAGEMENT: 'attendance-management',
  QNA_MANAGEMENT: 'qna-management',
  QNA: 'qna',

}

export const _drawType = {
  ARROW: 'ArrowDrawable',
  CIRCLE: 'CircleDrawable',
  RECT: 'RectDrawable',
  FREEPATH: 'FreePathDrawable',
  CURSOR: 'CursorPointer'
}

export const _userStatus = {
  ONLINE: 'Online',
  OFFLINE: 'Offline',
  WAITING: 'Waiting'
}

export const ROLE_TYPE = {
  ROLE_APP: 'ROLE_APP',
  ROLE_GROUP: 'ROLE_GROUP'
}

export const ROLE = {
  R_SUPPERADMIN: 'R_SUPPERADMIN',
  R_ADMIN: 'R_ADMIN',
  R_MEMBER: 'R_MEMBER',
  R_MOD: 'R_MOD',
  R_BOT_RECORD: 'R_BOT_RECORD',
  R_NODE_ADMIN: 'R_NODE_ADMIN', // admin nhóm
  R_NODE_MOD: 'R_NODE_MOD', // mod nhóm
  R_NODE_USER: 'R_NODE_USER' // thành viên nhóm
}

export const PER = {
  P_NODE_CREATE: 'P_NODE_CREATE',
  P_NODE_EDIT: 'P_NODE_EDIT',
  P_NODE_REMOVE: 'P_NODE_REMOVE',
  P_NODE_ASSIGN_ROLE: 'P_NODE_ASSIGN_ROLE', // Phân quyền hành trong nhóm
  P_NODE_KICK_USER: 'P_NODE_KICK_USER', // Đẩy user ra khỏi nhóm
  P_NODE_UPDATE_USER: 'P_NODE_UPDATE_USER', // Cập nhật thông tin user trong node
  P_NODE_INVITE_USER: 'P_NODE_INVITE_USER', // Mời thành viên vào Node

  P_USER_VIEW: 'P_USER_VIEW',
  P_USER_EDIT: 'P_USER_EDIT',
  P_USER_DELETE: 'P_USER_DELETE',
  P_USER_UPDATE_ROLE: 'P_USER_UPDATE_ROLE',
  P_USER_CREATE: 'P_USER_CREATE',

  P_ROLE_CREATE: 'P_ROLE_CREATE',
  P_ROLE_VIEW: 'P_ROLE_VIEW',
  P_ROLE_EDIT: 'P_ROLE_EDIT',
  P_ROLE_DELETE: 'P_ROLE_DELETE',

  P_REPORT_VIEW: 'P_REPORT_VIEW',

  P_SETTING_UPDATE: 'P_SETTING_UPDATE',

  P_MEETTING_VIEW: 'P_MEETTING_VIEW',
  P_MEETTING_CREATE: 'P_MEETTING_CREATE'
}

export const _queryPollsType = {
  LOCAL_KEY: { KEY: 'SHUFFLED_ITEMS' },
  INIT: 'INIT',
  CREATE: 'CREATE',
  LOCK: 'LOCK',
  PUBLIC: 'PUBLIC',
  END: 'END'
}
